downloadDescription: Ngee Ann Secondary has been selected to join in the Microsoft Innovative Schools World Tour for being a showcase example of the following Innovation Topics: learning environments, Physical learning environments, Professional learning communities.

downloadFile.name: ngee ann secondary school case study final.docx
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/3/8/5/38588869-52ca-4514-b42e-3439cfb70ac7/ngee ann secondary school case study final.docx

detailsSection:
Ngee Ann Secondary has been selected to join in the Microsoft Innovative Schools World Tour for being a showcase example of the following Innovation Topics:

1. 1:1 learning environments. Students work on their own devices and can use technology at any time to access educational tools.
2. Physical learning environments. Focus on physical spaces, seating, and atmosphere to encourage collaboration, creativity, and learning.
3. Professional learning communities. Technology and programs that support collaboration among teachers and their peer groups in other schools.
detailsSection_file_name: ngee ann secondary school case study final.docx
